props.cycle: Determines if the carousel should cycle through images.
props.hideControls: Hides the navigation controls (left and right).
props.interval: The duration between image cycles. Requires the **cycle** prop.
props.nextIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the next item.
props.prevIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the previous item.
props.progress: Displays a carousel progress bar. Requires the **cycle** prop and **interval**.
props.progressColor: Applies specified color to progress bar.
props.showArrowsOnHover: Displays navigation arrows only when the carousel is hovered over.

events.change: Emitted when the component value is changed by user interaction
